set-variable.value: #[%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { "logType":"Error: ", "code": 504, "message": "Gateway Timeout", "errorType": "MONGO:TIMEOUT", "dateTime": now(), "description": "The request to MongoDB timed out", "source": "Mongo DB" }]
